name: Refocus Media
tagline: Help you get a fresh perspective.
description: Refocus Media is an international, multi-faceted media solutions provider. We offer brand services and marketing strategies to a range of clients in every industry and field, with all our resources under one roof. We create a unique process for each client to ensure that business objectives are met, success is achieved, and customers are happy.
